'''Intricately Carved Calligraphy Table''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Items that belong to the ''Ornaments'' category can be placed on this table.

The blueprint for Intricately Carved Calligraphy Table is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Fragrant Cedar Wood = 12
|sort = Fragrant Cedar Wood
}}
